Steven



--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, Richard Turner <
ikkanshi@w...> wrote:
> Hi all, I have had a new arrival for Christmas. This is I believe a 
> Kyo-shoami guard from the early to mid 1600's, in sand iron 
and 
> depicting Feathers that are used in the Tea Ceremony. Really 
nice old 
> iron, the pics don't do it justice, I will try for better ones soon.
> 
> Question, the little plate of Shakudo on the upper right hand 
side of 
> the seppa dai in photo 1, what purpose would this serve.
> 
> Cheers
> 
> Rich
